categories: Category:Battles of the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: Operation Starbender was an operation of the reconstituted Sith Empire's Imperial Intelligence overseen by Keeper in 3649 BBY. The operation nearly ended in disaster when a pirate fleet attacked an Imperial base, but an unknown person—later discovered to be a member of the Star Cabal—used an advanced technology to override the pirate flagship's systems and cause it to detonate.
Operation Starbender was first mentioned in Keeper's biography on the official site for Star Wars: The Old Republic, and it was further expanded on in the Imperial Agent mission "The Hidden Throne".
